snippet: Martin Brodeur was magnificent for much of Game 2 against the Kings, blocking 30 of 31 shots, but his good night was undone in overtime.
abstract: New Jersey Devils goalie Martin Brodeur was magnificent for much of Game 2 on the Stanley Cup finals against the Los Angeles Kings, blocking 30 of 31 shots, but his good night was undone in overtime.
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur was magnificent for much of Game 2 against the Kings, blocking 30 of 31 shots, but his good night was undone in overtime.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Playoffs — Devils’ Brodeur Falls Shy Again
headline.main: Another Good Night for Brodeur, but Only a Great One Would Do
headline.print_headline: Another Good Night for Brodeur, but Only a Great One Would Do
